page.title: 10Questionnaires (Part 2)
page.content: Most of the local people came from Caernarfon itself some came from the surrounding villages.They came to Caernarfon at least twice a week.Most liked Caernarfon but would more of a variety in the shops. The vast majority had visited the leisure centre and were impressed.Most of them liked Pool Street.Most thought there was too much litter and most had bought something in town. The visitors were asked these questions. 1.Where do you live? 25 came from England 2 from Scotland one each from Canada,U.S.A.and Australia. 2.Will you be staying for more than a day at Caernarfon? 60% were staying for more than a day. 3.Why did you come to Caernarfon?The majority were on holiday
